description: Students encounter literature from former British colonies and from other countries of Africa, Asia, and Latin America. Primary attention is given to literatures in English, but the readings may include some translations. The course examines diverse cultural expressions and the historical and cultural contexts of the works read, including the relationship between oral and written literature and between indigenous and foreign elements. Prerequisite: FYW. Counts towards Africa & the Americas concentration.
name: Post-Colonial Lit
prerequisites: FYW. Counts towards Africa & the Americas concentration.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: FYW. Counts towards Africa & the Americas concentration.

title: Post-Colonial Literatures
